---------------------------------------------
R4 TEST 

AND

00101 - RS2
R5 gets 2^ in its slices.

LI R5 with 0000100010000100 at index 0 - 000
LI R5 with 0000100010000100 at index 1 - 001
LI R5 with 0000100010000100 at index 2 - 010
LI R5 with 0000100010000100 at index 3 - 011
LI R5 with 0000100010000100 at index 4 - 100
LI R5 with 0000100010000100 at index 5 - 101
LI R5 with 0000100010000100 at index 6 - 110
LI R5 with 0000100010000100 at index 7 - 111





00001 - RS1
R1 gets 2^ in its slices.

LI R1 with 0100100111000100 at index  X - XXX
LI R1 with 0100100111000100 at index  X - XXX
LI R1 with 0100100111000100 at index  X - XXX
LI R1 with 0100100111000100 at index  X - XXX
LI R1 with 0100100111000100 at index  X - XXX
LI R1 with 0100100111000100 at index  X - XXX
LI R1 with 0100100111000100 at index  X - XXX
LI R1 with 0100100111000100 at index  X - XXX

 
00000
R0 gets result.

Opcode
1100001011001010000100000

program

0010100000000100010000100 
0001000010001000010000101  
0010000010001000010000101  
0011000010001000010000101  
0100000010001000010000101  
0101000010001000010000101  
0110000010001000010000101
0111000010001000010000101  
0000010010011100010000001  
0001010010011100010000001  
0010010010011100010000001  
0011010010011100010000001  
0100010010011100010000001  
0101010010011100010000001  
0110010010011100010000001  
0111010010011100010000001

passes.
